mapper.select: select case when exists( select * from ujcms_collection t where t.channel_id_ = #{channelId} ) then 1 else 0 end as non_zero_exists
mapper.update: update ujcms_collection set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, channel_id_ = #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id_ = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description_ = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charset_ = #{charset,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_agent_ = #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interval_min_ = #{intervalMin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, interval_max_ = #{intervalMax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, list_urls_ = #{listUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, list_desc_ = #{listDesc,jdbcType=CHAR}, page_begin_ = #{pageBegin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, page_end_ = #{pageEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, list_area_pattern_ = #{listAreaPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, list_area_reg_ = #{listAreaReg,jdbcType=CHAR}, item_area_pattern_ = #{itemAreaPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_area_reg_ = #{itemAreaReg,jdbcType=CHAR}, item_url_pattern_ = #{itemUrlPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_url_filter_ = #{itemUrlFilter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_url_reg_ = #{itemUrlReg,jdbcType=CHAR}, item_url_js_ = #{itemUrlJs,jdbcType=CHAR}, auto_submit_ = #{autoSubmit,jdbcType=CHAR}, allow_duplicate_ = #{allowDuplicate,jdbcType=CHAR}, download_image_ = #{downloadImage,jdbcType=CHAR}, current_pages_ = #{currentPages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_items_ = #{currentItems,jdbcType=INTEGER}, success_count_ = #{successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_count_ = #{totalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status_ = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, error_info_ = #{errorInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_collection (id_, site_id_, channel_id_, user_id_, name_, description_, charset_, user_agent_, interval_min_, interval_max_, list_urls_, list_desc_, page_begin_, page_end_, list_area_pattern_, list_area_reg_, item_area_pattern_, item_area_reg_, item_url_pattern_, item_url_filter_, item_url_reg_, item_url_js_, auto_submit_, allow_duplicate_, download_image_, current_pages_, current_items_, success_count_, total_count_, status_, order_, error_info_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{charset,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intervalMin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intervalMax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{listUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{listDesc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pageBegin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{listAreaPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{listAreaReg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itemAreaPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemAreaReg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itemUrlPattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemUrlFilter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemUrlReg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itemUrlJs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{autoSubmit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{allowDuplicate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{downloadImage,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{currentPages,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentItems,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{successCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{errorInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.site_id_, t.channel_id_, t.user_id_, t.name_, t.description_, t.charset_, t.user_agent_, t.interval_min_, t.interval_max_, t.list_urls_, t.list_desc_, t.page_begin_, t.page_end_, t.list_area_pattern_, t.list_area_reg_, t.item_area_pattern_, t.item_area_reg_, t.item_url_pattern_, t.item_url_filter_, t.item_url_reg_, t.item_url_js_, t.auto_submit_, t.allow_duplicate_, t.download_image_, t.current_pages_, t.current_items_, t.success_count_, t.total_count_, t.status_, t.order_, t.error_info_
